amendment.description: An amendment to strike "For purposes" on page 4, line 8, and insert "except as provided in subparagraph (G), for purposes"; to insert "with respect to any qualified insured depository institution" on page 4, line 15, before the comma at the end; to strike the closing quotation marks and the second period on page 7, line 2 and to insert a new subsection on page 7, line 2 entitled CONDITIONS FOR INCREASED DEPOSIT INSURANCE COVERAGE.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Maloney amendment was withdrawn.
